author: Lillian Rizzo
title: Bon-Ton Stores Seeks Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Protection
text:
Bon-Ton Stores Inc., one of the largest regional department-store chains in the U.S., sought bankruptcy protection on Sunday as discussions with its debtholders have yet to come to a conclusion.
The Pennsylvania-based retailer filed for chapter 11 in U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del., in a bid to deal with a crushing debt load and declining sales.
